markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Swim](/Feats.aspx?ID=829) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 265 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You Swim 5 feet farther on a success and 10 feet farther on a critical success, to a maximum of your Speed. If you’re legendary in Athletics, you gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed.
name: Quick Swim

<summary>
Swim quickly.
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 7" pfs="Standard" > Quick Swim Source Core Rulebook pg. 265 4.0 Prerequisites Master in Athletics --- You Swim 5 feet farther on a success and 10 feet farther on a critical success, to a maximum of your Speed. If you’re legendary in Athletics, you gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed.
